title: Herobear and the Kid Volume 1: The Inheritance
description: Herobear and the Kid is a nostalgic view of childhood, complete with new schools, bullies, true love, imagination, and...a magic bear. After his grandfather passes away, young Tyler inherits an old stuffed, toy bear and broken pocket watch. He soon learns that things aren't always what they seem, and that you shouldn't judge a bear by its cover. Come join us to remember your childhood, as Tyler remembers his.
author: Mike Kunkel
